title: MetaRecord
description: Schema of a Record which contains the screen properties.

data.description: The data contained by this record.

width.description: The width of the screen in pixels, normalized based on the device pixels per inch density (DPI). Example: if a device has a DPI = 2, the normalized width is the current width divided by 2.

height.description: The height of the screen in pixels, normalized based on the device pixels per inch density (DPI). Example: if a device has a DPI = 2, the normalized height is the current height divided by 2.

href.description: Browser-specific. URL of the view described by this record.
